'''''Radiance Aflame''''' is the third [[Natlan]] Chapter [[soundtrack]].

It features a total of 58 soundtracks produced by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team.

The album was first announced on April 25, 2025, during the [[Special Program]] for Version 5.6. The tracklist was announced on April 28 <!-- on? -->and the album was released on April 30.
